bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Local and metropolitan area networks--Media Access Control (MAC) Bridges and Virtual Bridged Local Area Networks--Amendment 16: Provider Bridging--Remote Customer Service Interfaces
IEEE Standard for Local and metropolitan area networks--Media Access Control (MAC) Bridges and Virtual Bridged Local Area Networks--Amendment 16: Provider Bridging--Remote Customer Service Interfaces
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Std 802.1Qbc-2011 (Amendment to IEEE Std 802.1Q-2011, as amended by IEEE Std 802.1Qbe-2011)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This amendment to IEEE Std 802.1 Q-2011 specifies the use of service virtual local area networks (S-VLANs) to provide customer service interfaces in one Provider Bridged Network for customer interface local area networks (LANs) attached to another Provider Bridged Network.

This amendment to IEEE Std 802.1Q-2011 specifies the use of service virtual local area networks (S-VLANs) to provide customer service interfaces in one Provider Bridged Network for customer interface local area networks (LANs) attached to another Provider Bridged Network.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
